name: SLevolution
overview:
SLevolution create “End to End” audio solutions for the Second Life metaverse.

From state of the art mp3 players, our Second Life Audio publishing system “Hermes,” rehearsal studios and concert staging, networked Mp3 E-Commerce solutions, Design and Building, Audio Streaming, Avatar enhancement, Virtual instruments and more.

Our principal product is the Hermes metaverse audio content management, publishing and distribution system.

In essence, Hermes is the first viable Audio CD burner for the Metaverse - Simple to use with a feature set never before seen in Second Life, Underneath the user friendly interface is an Audio Content Management System - ACMS - that enables you, the artist or producer to load, store, sort, web enable, sell and distribute your music in Second Life, the alternative Metaverses and beyond. Its easy to use and gives you - the artist or producer - full control over your music content and files.

Features

  • In-world playback and delivery of your audio files
  • Enables “Desktop delivery” of Mp3 file to users desktop
  • Build in Mp3 Player to preview and test your work
  • Create “Sellable” or “Demo” albums
  • Unlimited project previews before you burn your project
  • Secure - uses cloaked URL’s to keep your files safe
  • Full audit trail - keeps track of your sales
  • Drag and Drop Web Interface keeps track of your library
  • Web Stats available - find out who is listening to your music
  • Secure Track Storage with no monthly fees payable
  • Your choice of vendor or vendor script
  • No Inworld Scripting needed
  • No Php or web server coding needed
  • Receive payment in L$
  • One track or an full album - you choose
  • Custom track Artwork
  • Custom Packaging
  • Animated CD Case loader
  • Contents and “Goodie Bag” giver
